NTF_DONT_SHOW_AGAIN_TT.message: Hide these notifications for the next 30 days

NTF_OVERLAY_INACTIVE_MESSAGE_CH.message: To enable overlay blocking, we need access to information on the websites you visit. Click 'I Agree' to allow access to this information and for use according to our Privacy Policy.

NTF_OVERLAY_INACTIVE_MESSAGE_FF.message: To enable overlay blocking, we need access to your visited URLs, IP address, operating system, and browser information. Click “I Agree” to allow access to this information and for use according to our Privacy Policy.

NTF_OVERLAY_UNAVAILABLE_MESSAGE.message: Overlay blocking isn't supported in Firefox private mode

NTF_Stars_1.message: I love popups, there's no other explanation

NTF_Stars_2.message: Your hard work means nothing to me

NTF_TIP_OVERLAY_MENU.message: You can also remove overlays by right clicking anywhere on the page and choosing “Remove Overlay”

NTF_shareUsSub.message: Don't you think it's time to tell your friends about us?

PP_Incognito_Step3.message: Mark the checkbox next to "Allow in incognito"

PP_Incognito_Title.message: In order to enable Poper Blocker in Chrome's Incognito Mode, follow the next steps:

PP_PopupsEssential.message: Popups are essential functionalities on this site.

PP_PopupsNotFound.message:

PP_TooltipAllowPops.message: Click here to allow popups on this site. It will be added to your personal whitelist.

PP_TooltipBlockPops.message: Click here to block popups on this site. It will be removed from your personal whitelist.

PP_TooltipContributeButton.message: Click here to contribute to the PoperBlocker Team.

PP_TooltipReportOver.message: Click here to remove an overlay that has popped up on the current page

PP_TooltipReportPop.message: Click here to update us on a missed popup in a new tab or window

PP_TooltipWhitelistBlockPops.message: We verified that popups are essential functionalities on this site, but feel free to block anyway.

allowAlwaysTip.message: Always allow popups on this site. This site will be added to your whitelist.

allowAlways_TT.message: Always allow popups on this site. Choose this option if you trust this site.

allowOnceTip.message: Allows popup just this one time. The next time you see this popup we will ask you again.

badgeToggleLabel.message: Show a badge on the extension's icon when a popup is blocked.

blacklistTip.message: Always block overlays on these sites:

doNotShowTips.message: Don't show this notification when popups are blocked on this site.

extDescription.message: #1 extension to block annoying popups, popunders & overlays in an easy & effective way. Browse without interference on all sites.

extName.message: Pop up blocker for Chrome™ - Poper Blocker

extName_FF.message: Popup blocker for FF: Poper Blocker

needRefresh.message: Refresh open tabs in order for this change to take effect.

notFoundAutoOverlayLabel.message: Overlay auto detection did not find any overlays

notFoundOverlayLabel.message: An overlay wasn't found. Try auto detection?

notificationToggleLabel.message: Show an on-page notification when a popup is blocked.

overlayContextMenuToggleLabel.message: Enable "Remove Overlay" option in the context menu.

overlaysEnableMessage.message: Enable overlay blocking Allows Poper Blocker access to information on the websites you visit, for use as stated in our Privacy Policy.

overlaysToggleLabel.message: Enable overlay blocking (sends anonymous data to Poper Blocker developers)

popupsAllowed.message: Popups are allowed on this website.

popupsBlocked.message: Popups are blocked on this website.

removeAlwaysText.message: Always remove this overlay and don't show this notification again. You can change this in the options page.

undoTips.message: You manually removed this overlay, click it to Show overlay

websiteInWhitelistOverlayMessage.message: This website is whitelisted. No overlay detection made.
